comments.body: {{"error":{"name":"AssertionError","actual":90,"operator":"to be approximately 810 ±10","message":"expected 90 to be approximately 810 ±10",}} from [here|https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/blob/TIMOB-24816/Resources/ti.ui.view.test.js#L504]
Still valid, error is now {{expected 53 to be approximately 810 ±10}}, looks to be due to windows not persisting the state of the view after animation is complete
